title: Collaborate on Research Data Analysis
description: A team of scientists is collaborating on the analysis of a large dataset and needs to share results and interpretations.

tasks.description: Upload a large dataset to a shared, secure research platform.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully uploads the dataset to the collaborative workspace.

tasks.description: One scientist performs an analysis and shares the resulting plots and code with the team within the platform.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent shares the analysis, and team members are notified.

tasks.description: Another scientist adds comments and annotations to the shared plots.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds comments, suggesting an alternative way to visualize the data.

tasks.description: The team jointly drafts a summary of the findings within the platform's collaborative document editor.
tasks.expected_outcome: The team works together in real-time to produce a consensus summary of the results.
